description: This file defines a React context provider for a Kanban board, including state management and CRUD operations for columns and cards, with real-time updates via Supabase subscriptions.

methods.name: useKanban()
methods.description: Custom React hook to access the Kanban context

methods.name: KanbanProvider({ children })
methods.description: React component that provides the Kanban context, manages state, and handles CRUD operations for columns and cards with real-time updates.

methods.name: fetchAll
methods.description: Fetches all columns and cards data from Supabase and updates local state.

methods.name: addColumn
methods.description: Adds a new column with a specified title.

methods.name: updateColumn
methods.description: Updates an existing column identified by id with provided updates.

methods.name: reorderColumns
methods.description: Reorders columns based on an array of ordered ids with assigned positions.

methods.name: addCard
methods.description: Adds a new card to a specified column with given fields.

methods.name: updateCard
methods.description: Updates a card by id with provided updates.

methods.name: deleteCard
methods.description: Deletes a card by id, updates local state optimistically.

methods.name: reorderCardsInColumn
methods.description: Reorders cards within a column based on an ordered list.

methods.name: bulkInsertCards
methods.description: Inserts multiple cards into a column, assigning sequential positions.
